item.description: There is a great event happening on Wednesday here in Boston. The Quebec office is hosting a food and wine event. 12 French restaurants from Boston will cook food from Quebec, and offer wine tasting. A great place to meet other people from Quebec or friends of Quebec. You can buy tickets through goldstar (discounted) through this link - https://www.goldstar.... Tickets need to be purchased before and 15$ rebate is offered if you buy before Oct 10th and also another rebate for group of 4 and more. See web site : http://www.tasteofqc.... I hope some of you can make it !

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Taste of Quebec
